meetMichael.title: Meet Michael Abramson III
meetMichael.subtitle: A dedicated advocate for students, teachers, and families
meetMichael.section1Para1: Michael Abramson III is running for the Tempe Elementary Governing Board because he believes that every child deserves access to high-quality education that prepares them for success. With a deep commitment to serving all generations of learners, Michael brings fresh perspectives and innovative ideas to address the challenges facing our schools.
meetMichael.section1Para2: As a lifelong learner and community advocate, Michael understands the critical role that education plays in shaping our children's futures. He is dedicated to ensuring that Tempe Elementary School District continues to be a place where students thrive, teachers are supported, and families feel heard.
meetMichael.section2Para1: Michael has been an active member of the Tempe community, volunteering with local organizations and advocating for policies that strengthen our neighborhoods and schools. His approach is collaborative and inclusive, seeking input from all stakeholders to make informed decisions that benefit our entire district.
meetMichael.section2Para2: He believes in transparent governance and open communication between the school board, administrators, teachers, parents, and community members. Michael is committed to building bridges and fostering partnerships that enhance educational opportunities for all students in Tempe Elementary School District.
meetMichael.section3Para1: Michael's vision for Tempe Elementary School District centers on three core principles: excellence in education, support for educators, and meaningful community engagement. He believes that by investing in our teachers, modernizing our facilities, and implementing evidence-based programs, we can create an environment where every student can succeed.
meetMichael.section3Para2: His campaign slogan, 'Writing towards all generations,' reflects his commitment to creating lasting positive change that will benefit current students, future generations, and the broader community. Michael is ready to work tirelessly to ensure that Tempe Elementary School District remains a model of educational excellence.
meetMichael.quote: Education is not just about preparing children for the future—it's about empowering them to create the future they envision. Together, we can write a better tomorrow for all generations.

priorities.title: Our Priorities
priorities.subtitle: Key issues I will champion for Tempe Elementary School District
priorities.priority1Desc: Teachers are the backbone of our education system. I am committed to ensuring that our educators have the resources, professional development opportunities, and competitive compensation they deserve. By investing in our teachers, we invest in our students' success.
priorities.priority2Desc: Every student deserves the opportunity to excel. I will advocate for evidence-based programs, individualized support services, and enrichment opportunities that help all students reach their full potential, regardless of their background or circumstances.
priorities.priority3Desc: Transparent, open communication between the board, families, and community members is essential. I will work to ensure that all voices are heard and that parents and community members have meaningful opportunities to participate in decisions affecting our schools.
priorities.priority4Desc: We must be good stewards of taxpayer dollars while ensuring adequate funding for critical programs and services. I will advocate for responsible budgeting that prioritizes classroom needs, maintains our facilities, and plans strategically for the district's future.
priorities.priority5Desc: All students deserve to learn in a safe, inclusive, and supportive environment. I will work to strengthen school safety measures, expand mental health resources, and foster a positive school climate where every child feels valued and respected.
